- Are [93mall[0m [93mnanoplastics[0m [93mequally[0m [93mneurotoxic[0m? [93mInfluence[0m of [93msize[0m and [93msurface[0m [93mfunctionalization[0m on the [93mtoxicity[0m of [93mpolystyrene[0m [93mnanoplastics[0m in [93mhuman[0m [93mneuronal[0m [93mcells[0m.: [93mNanoplastics[0m ([93mNPs[0m) are an [93memerging[0m [93menvironmental[0m [93mconcern[0m, [93mparticularly[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93mpotential[0m [93minteractions[0m with the [93mnervous[0m [92msystem[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mevaluated[0m the [93mneurotoxic[0m [93meffects[0m of [93mfour[0m [93mtypes[0m of [93mpolystyrene[0m [93mnanoplastics[0m ([93mPS[0m-[93mNPs[0m): [93munmodified[0m ([93mplain[0m) [93m50[0m [93mnm[0m and [93m100[0m [93mnm[0m [93mparticles[0m, and [93m100[0m [93mnm[0m [93mparticles[0m [93mfunctionalized[0m with [93mcarboxyl[0m ([93mC[0m-[93mNPs[0m) or [93mamine[0m (A-[93mNPs[0m) [93mgroups[0m. [93mHuman[0m [93mSH[0m-[93mSY5Y[0m [93mneuroblastoma[0m [93mcells[0m were [93mexposed[0m to [93m1[0m-[93m500[0m [93mμg[0m [93mmL[0m -[93m1[0m for [93m24[0m or [93m48[0m [93mhours[0m. [93mDynamic[0m [93mlight[0m [93mscattering[0m [93mrevealed[0m [93maggregation[0m of [93mplain[0m [93m50[0m [93mnm[0m [93mNPs[0m in [93mwater[0m, while [93mpresence[0m of ≥[93m1[0m% [93mfetal[0m [93mbovine[0m [93mserum[0m [93mimproved[0m [93mcolloidal[0m [93mstability[0m [93macross[0m [93mall[0m [93mparticle[0m [93mtypes[0m. [93mZeta[0m [93mpotentials[0m in [93mwater[0m were [93mapproximately[0m -[93m45[0m [93mmV[0m for [93mplain[0m and [93mC[0m-[93mNPs[0m and -[93m30[0m [93mmV[0m for A-[93mNPs[0m. In [93mcomplete[0m [93mmedium[0m, [93mall[0m [93mvalues[0m [93mshifted[0m [93mtoward[0m -[93m20[0m to -[93m13[0m [93mmV[0m, [93mconsistent[0m with [93mprotein[0m [93mcorona[0m [93mformation[0m. [93mIntegrating[0m [93mcolloidal[0m [93mstability[0m, [93msurface[0m [93mchemistry[0m, and [93morganelle[0m-[93mlevel[0m [93manalyses[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mestablished[0m a [93munified[0m [93mmechanistic[0m [92mframework[0m for [93mPS[0m-[93mNP[0m [93mneurotoxicity[0m. [93mToxicity[0m [93mendpoints[0m [93mincluded[0m [93mcell[0m [93mviability[0m, [93mROS[0m/[93mRNS[0m [93mgeneration[0m, [93mparticle[0m [93minternalization[0m, and [93mmorphological[0m and [93multrastructural[0m [93manalysis[0m. [93mPlain[0m [93mPS[0m-[93mNPs[0m [93mshowed[0m [93mnegligible[0m [93mcytotoxicity[0m, [93mwhereas[0m [93mC[0m-[93mNPs[0m and [93mespecially[0m A-[93mNPs[0m [93msignificantly[0m [93mreduced[0m [93mcell[0m [93mviability[0m. These [93mfindings[0m [93midentify[0m [93msurface[0m [93mchemistry[0m, [93mmore[0m than [93mparticle[0m [93msize[0m, as the [93mprimary[0m [93mdriver[0m of [93mPS[0m-[93mNP[0m [93mneurotoxicity[0m, [93mhighlighting[0m its [93mimportance[0m for [93mrisk[0m [93mprioritization[0m and [93mregulatory[0m [93mframeworks[0m [93maddressing[0m [93mNP[0m [93mhazards[0m.
